summary: The implementation successfully fulfills all core requirements. The backend implements the Student type with stable storage, add/get/update methods. The frontend provides a form for adding students, displays all records with edit functionality, has no authentication, and uses a warm educational color scheme with terracotta and sage green. However, the backend implements additional sorting features not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend includes sorting functionality via getAllStudentsSortedByEmail method and Student comparison module with compareByEmail and compareByUid functions
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Search or filter capabilities' in the non-goals section. The implemented sorting methods (getAllStudentsSortedByEmail, compareByEmail, compareByUid) were not requested and appear to be additional features beyond the specification.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend includes getStudent method to retrieve individual students by UID
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-2 requests methods to 'add a new student record, retrieve all students, update an existing student'. The getStudent method to retrieve a single student by UID was not explicitly requested. Only getAllStudents was specified.
